reviewText: Theses are the funniest movies ever made. I have seen them countless times and they are still hilarious to me. Product was as described and in pristine conditon.

Totally worth buying if you can appreciate physical, smart a** comedy and laughing out loud! After you've watch it 2 or 3+ times, it keeps on getting even better!  I just wish they kept making more Fletch movies!
awesome collector's edition set!  I wasn't expecting the 2 seperate discs or the hysterical Fletch rotating disguise case.  I definitely recommend!
This is a must have for a Chevy fan. His intelligent style of comedy mixed in with his costumes is great.

Got The Fletch Collection in the mail from Amazon yesterday (8/20/08). Fletch is the same exact disc that is found in the "Jane Doe" edition and Fletch Lives is the same blue disc as in the previous dvd release, that is still available for purchase. The set is almost identical to the "Jane Doe" edition in the sense that there's a slip cover and a single dvd case with a "flipper". There is no digi-pak here folks. The only special features are the same ones on the "Jane Doe" edition. Fletch is in 5.1 Dolby and Fletch Lives only has 2.0 Dolby. Both are in 1.85:1 anamorphic.
Great buy if you don't own either or if you want to upgrade to save a slight bit of space.
loves it so much thank much to you
He is very funny in this movie.
Very funny
very happy with purchase, arrived before estimated delivery date....item as described
Have not watched it yet, but love any of his Fletch films.

Love Fletch! The one liners keep on coming! I received it quickly and as described.

If you like vintage Chevy Chase, like the Vacation movies, Caddyshack and Spies Like us, then you already love these movies and you have excellent taste. Congratulations.
If you don't already love these movies, then you haven't seen them, in which case YOU SHOULD NOT BE READING THIS. You should be buying and watching this movie.
I GUARANTEE YOU WILL LOVE IT.
My husband loves these movies! I was so excited to find a package deal DVD set. Perfect stocking stuffer this year for christmas. It shipped on time.

Hilarious to the point of causing extreme coughing spells. Have a serious stash of cough drops available when you watch these! You may even need to pause for a few short breaks in between segments...

Excellent!!!
two of my favorite movies ever!
Some of his best work, Chevy Chase plays the character beautifully and the movie is very funny. The sequel is almost as good, and chevy's characters are very entertaining.
Chevy chase is funny in these movies. I like the plots.

It is enjoyable to see Fletch do all his costume changes. The stories may be contrived, but Chevy Chase and company do a good job of spoofing and making good out of bad. Very enjoyable if you need a laugh or two.
Funny, I like Chevy and he does a great job as Fletch.

We were very happy with the purchase of The Fletch Collection. Chevy Chase was a favorite when these first came out, and to watch both movies again after all these years was amazing! Still just as funny and a reminder of how funny Chase is! His change from one character to another and another is hilarious! Getting both Fletch and Fletch Lives in one purchase was a great bonus as well as a value.

We were very happy with the seller - the time of delivery as well as the quality of packaging were both well rated!
Cute movies. Very fun
this is a fun movie and enjoyed seeing this again

My all time favorite movie!  Chevy Chase is a genius in this classic!
Chocolate Pudding on film...better than booze. Quicker than a Florida vacation.
I pretty much now all the lines from this movie.  I had a copy on vhs but wanted to get it on dvd for my collection.  This is a hilarious film and one of Chevy Chases best.
I bought this because I wanted to see David Harper, a.k.a. Jim Bob Walton.  It is a fantastic movie!  I highly recommend this!

great movie
Haven't really gotten into Fletch Lives, but Fletch is so goooood.
Classic movie with classic lines. There's really nothing more to say.

Fletch was an excellent movie, a one hit wonder so to speak. They tried to catch that glory a second time with Fletch Lives and it just does not quite hit the mark. I gave the movie five stars for Fletch. Fletch Lives I would give 3 stars. It's good, just not great. Both stories have Chevy Chase in a multitude of disguises showing off his talent as an actor. I won't go into details, as I don't want to spoil it for anyone, but if you have not seen Fletch, and you like comedy in the style of the late John Ritter, then you won't wan to miss this movie. I wish they would have, or would make a third Fletch movie. I am certain that after all of this time, they might find a great story for him. If you like Chevy Chase as I do, buy this set it's worth the money.
Arrived early, great condition. Great movies for a great price.
Good movies, many quotes.
Good.
Come on.  It's Chevy at his best.  We have now seen his worst (hopefully) which should make this all the better.
Good Show. Thank you.

This DVD collection was delivered on time in good condition and met all my expectations. I've loved Chevy Chase all of my adult life and knew these titles before I purchased. I will be sharing with family which will include a new generation of CC fans.
It was great to see these movies again.  They reminded me of when I was a teenager. Fletch 2 was definitely not as good as the first but did was still worth watching again.
One the top ten 1980s films for me.....loved it when I was a kid, and love it just as much now...loads of laughs....definitely one to be added to any dvd collection

I purchased this Fletch DVD set the day before yesterday. They arrived today. Both movies are in wide screen as stated and are the real deal. I haven't seen these movies in years and both are very high on my favorites list. Will be watching them this evening. Very good price as well!
Awesome purchase!  I love both of these movies, and I can watch both of them over and over again, always hilarious!

I could never understand why this movie didn't get more attention. Chevy Chase is a brilliant comic, and memorable scenes abound. The supporting actors are great, even those with small parts. Simply put: It's a classic.
Very good movie! ! I recommend this movie to anyone. Good quality for viewing. Funny comedy movie for the family!
This movie was funny and I really enjoyed watching it. Chubby Chase just really made me laugh a lot. He is just so naturally funny. This movie I watch over again. It's just that funny.

I am a big fan of Chevy Chase and always wanted this movie in my collection.

Great transaction and the movie is great!
Who doesn't love one of Chevy Chase's most iconic characters.  The fact that I can get both Fletch movies in one package, Awesome!  I highly recommend to any Chevy Chase fan.
Come on.  It is Chevy Chase.... You either get it or you do not.  I think he is a comic genius.
Just as I remembered. Goofy and fun movies. Delivered on time and in great condition and the price was right. No regrets.
Unexpected suprise, there were two dvds. arrived quickly. Thought this would be a fun dvd for my son who loves Chevy.  He was delighted
I absolutely love these movies! They are such classics I am so grateful to my wife for introducing me to these movies.  They came in a timely manner in perfect condition.
This is one of my wife's favorite movies.  Just what she wanted for Christmas. Two movies for a very low price.
Chevy Chase is good in almost everything.  I am a big fan of most of his movies.  Great actor and entertainer.
Bought this a gift for a Fletch fan and they were thrilled.  Apparently this isn't something that is not easy to find locally.
I liked "Fletch" more than 'Fletch Lives'.  "Fletch" was very funny, with witty dialog, just as in the book by Gregory McDonald.

I bought this set because my husband really liked the movies.  It was the first time I'd seen them.  They were pretty good.  Decent plots and plenty of humor.  I would recommend them and I know my husband definitely would.  He loves them.
I forgot how much fun this movie was. If you like Chevy then get it. I ended buying a couple others as well.
This is the kind of humor all Chevy fans love. If you like any of his work you should buy this film.
I have purchased this movie in multiple formats and now I have added it to my DVD collection.  This is a timeless classic and keeps us laughing.
Love Chevy Chase and any movies he's made! How can you not like good family movies with Chevy Chase in it!
One of the greatest movies ever made for the cinematic treasure they are. def something I've decided to pass on to others

I can't explain why we love this so much! We have grown up with Chevy Chase and have been laughing ever since. We had to have the collection in our house. I don't think it would have been complete without it. We love the outfits and characters he comes up with. Such early comedy I love it!
You can't go wrong with Fletch Movies, virtually any movie with Chevy Chase.  2 for 1... even a better deal.
Don't buy many movies anymore, because I stream a lot, but these movies haven't been available there for a while.  Great price for a couple good classics.
Classic movie that never can get tired from. It is really good and a reflection when movies like this are not longer made these days.
I love Chevy Chase and this one is very funny.  He definitely doesn't need anyone else to make you laugh.
Two great Chase movies, with Classic Chevy .... man of many disguises, and inuendos ... why he was so popular on SNL and these type of movies ... very funny stuff

As a child of the 80's there are certain characters that I grew up with. Fletch happens to be one of those which brings me back to a time in my life which includes many fond memories. Having said that, Chevy Chase does a great job of creating a character which is silly, slap-stick, sarcastic, yes serious when required. In some ways, it's the essence of a solid, casual film from my youth which I fondly enjoy when possible. Give Fletch a try, I dare you!
I forgot how nasty this one is! It's a lot of fun, but I wouldn't show it to a teenager, every comment is about sex!

Pretty good dribbler, nice outside shot. Fletch! Watch as he shakes four five defneders, with EASE!!!

So What are you in for?
This movie is a classic. One of the funniest movies that Chevy Chase has ever done. If you haven't seen it, then you don't know what you are missing.

I'm harping in other reviews about the condition of the dvds (Amazon didn't publish my two reviews on collections that showed up scratched, even though purchased brand-new and through Amazon..Buffy being one of them) but this collection is fine.

Fletch and Fletch Lives are what I would call "Sunday afternoon" movies, as there is a bit of a plot to tie the comedy bits together, and its silliness brings out the kid in everyone..a good laugh generator and a great price.
Although the 2nd movie is not as good as the first, I could not pass up the value of getting both movies in one package.
If you like chevy chase you have to own this set. Will make you laugh for both movies. Great movies.

One of Chevy Chase's best - the running dry, sarcastic commentary from Chevy, delivered so subtly in some cases you almost might miss it,
is what makes this so enjoyable.
I never get tired of this movie. Full of great laughs and entertainment. Never get tired of Chevy Chase movies.
Love it so much I bought the book and going to start this next break. Chevy chase is incredible he's the white Beverly Hills cop.

It's Chevy, so you know it's gonna be pretty good.
The Fletch movies aren't his best work, but they are good for some laughs.

While you won't say either movie is a blockbuster, you won't be disappointed either.

One of Chase's great roles!  Fletch was so great when I saw it, I loved the film, and it was quite popular.  Chase dresses up in numerous disguises, and the one that he was the "roller skating guru" I didn't even realize it was him.  I suppose if you're not a fan of Chase, or didn't know who he was, you might not be impressed with this outing.  Some of his references are also going to be lost on today's viewer.  However, the film is fun.  The follow up isn't as good, but if you like the first one, you'll like the second one too.
you gotta love chevy chase  very funny as always will keep you laughing for a long time  i love both of the fletch movies.
The Price is great, the product is awesome and the quality is excellent!  Thank you!  Will buy again!  Easy Transaction!

"It takes a Big man to admit your wrong ,  and I'am no big man ."
That is one of my favorit lines in the movie. With all his disguises,he is the ultimate B S artist,and he's good . Very Funny
Thank you so very much for this great movie; I love it!  I will be sharing it with my friends.
This is just a funny and entertaining movie to play while guests mill about the pool and around drinks and hors d'oeuvre's...the book though is more fun to read snippets out of occasionally..
Hilarious Chevy Chase classic. A must see..
